description: [Sandworm Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0034) has used backdoors that can delete files used in an attack from an infected system.(Citation: ESET Telebots Dec 2016)(Citation: ESET Telebots July 2017)(Citation: Mandiant-Sandworm-Ukraine-2022)
